item.name: Stasis Headband
item.desc: A tastelessly blue and green colored headband, with the words, '{DarkCyan}ENJOY YOUR STASIS!!!{end}' sewn into it in some shade of light green.

item.name: Flathead Screwdriver
item.desc: A flathead screwdriver with a red plastic handle. Maybe it could be used to {Yellow}unscrew{end} something.

item.name: {Blue}Blue Keycard{end}
item.desc: A plastic card with a barcode and a faded {Yellow}blue{end} strip on it. It looks like it could be used to {Yellow}open a door{end} of some kind.
item.aliases: keycard/blue keycard/the keycard/kaycard with blue stripe

item.name: {Magenta}Magic{end} {Red}Wand{end}
item.desc: A plastic card with a barcode and a faded {Yellow}blue{end} strip on it. It looks like it could be used to {Yellow}open a door{end} of some kind.
